commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
To play game, go inside the Portal 2 Complete folder > Portal 2 > Right click and run 'Portal2' as administrator

This download includes the complete edition:
     – Aperture Tag: The Paint Gun Testing Initiative
     – Portal Stories: Mel
     – Thinking with Time Machine
     – Portal 2 – The Final Hours


You can play co-op with 2 controllers in one PC, but you must enable it in console

If you get a "Steam has rejected client" error, Find file "steam_appid" (path where you copy game ...\Portal 2 
Complete\Portal 2\steam_appid) and edit with notepad from "620" to 
"Portal 2 620", save and start game. You have to do it every time. 
Dont panic when save game is empty. Just again edit steam_appid and it'll appear

Follow this: https://i.imgur.com/ReTGqT9.png



For more FREE PC games, visit steamunlocked.com
